attributes.action: Make motorcycle parking fines need to be proportionate and fair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The typical cost of parking a car is £1 to £4 per hour. The fine for parking a car illegally is £40/£80. The typical cost of parking a motorcycle is £0.50 per day to £1.50 per day. And yet the fines are the same £40/£80. 

This is utterly disproportionate and appears to be a hidden new revenue stream for councils.  Make the fines proportionate, I would suggest around £5 per parking offence.  

In the few months I have been parking in and around Westminster, I have had over £240 in fines!
